TextBlock.Text: SPIRE: We will need to build a gravity cannon here on <Color=lightblue>Ember Twin</Color> to allow for shuttle travel back to <Color=lightblue>Brittle Hollow</Color>. This model can be used as reference for the full-scale construction, and to send small objects until construction is complete.
SPIRE: Despite its scale, this model operates at full power. Be careful when near it - stepping inside will result in a rapid trip to orbit.

KOUSA: We must be cautions once the cannon is complete. Multiple test launches from the model have collided with <Color=lightblue>Ash Twin</Color>. Such a collision would surely be fatal for any passengers.
